room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: I've never had so much fun there was so much stuff to do. I will definitely be coming back, with my family and other friends

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: This has been one of the most fun escape games i've done, the atmosphere and the decor stand outs because of the attention to detail. The enigmas are also extremely riveting and unique. Would highly recommend it.

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: Wow, is all I can say. I am an escape room hobbyist and this is by far the best room I have ever escaped from! The puzzles are so well thought out and blew my mind. The atmosphere is amazing, from the team members to the location. This escape room is a must on your Vegas bucket list!
